description:
Bike to work, running for the train, stairs instead of elevator – the city makes you move. The A2B Polo is made to go with you. The Polylain™ fabric – a knit blending responsibly-sourced Merino wool with polyester fibres – feels great on, stays comfortable across a range of temperatures, helps manage moisture, and naturally resists odour. And the design goes way beyond nine-to-five with a hidden snap placket and trim fit that give it a contemporary style that steps above traditional.

Updated with a revised trim fit and restyled collar.
name: Arcteryx A2B Polo SS - Mens
